name: DiagnosisRole
title: Diagnosis Role
description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

concept.definition: The diagnoses documented for administrative purposes as the basis for a hospital or other institutional admission
The diagnoses documented for administrative purposes at the time of hospital or other institutional discharge
The diagnosis documented for billing purposes
